titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business.
Committee on Small Business requested executive comment from OMB, SBA.

bill.summary: 4/7/1987--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Investment Act of 1958 to allow equity contributions by State and local governments to small business investment companies to be counted in meeting the minimum paid-in capital requirements.
